info: The Project 2 (E35: Hasanabdal-Havellian Expressway) is part of national trade corridor. It will connect existing M1 at Hasanabadal to Havellian, and will further extend to Abbotabad and Mansehra to North. The Project is almost parallel with existing N5 which is being urbanized in many sections. Due to high traffic volume and deteriorated road condition, E35 is becoming necessary in order to improve the sub regional connectivity within Pakistan, and to China, Afghanistan and other central Asian countries.
name: NATIONAL TRADE CORRIDOR HIGHWAY INVESTMENT PROGRAM - TRANCHE 2
